content: उल्लासः {@--1@} Joy, delight; सोल्लासं <ls>U. 6</ls>; सकौतुकोल्लासं <ls>U. 2</ls>; उल्लासः फुल्लपंकेरुहपटलपतन्मत्तपुष्पंधयानां <ls>S. D.</ls> {@--2@} Light, splendour. {@--3@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech in which a reference is made to the merits or demerits of one thing by comparing or contrasting the merits or demerits of another; अन्यदीयगुणदोषप्रयुक्तमन्यस्य गुणदोषयोराधानमुल्लासः <ls>R. G.</ls>; for examples, see <ls>R. G.</ls> {%ad loc.%}; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Chandr. 5. 131-133</ls>. {@--4@} A division of a book, such as chapter, section &c.; as the ten Ullāsas of the Kāvyaprakāśa. {@--5@} Beginning, commencement.
